
# [type[!]:] summary [#TaskId]
#
# [Details]
#
# 1. 'type' is optional and can be: fix, feature or chore (default)
# 2. If type ends with "!" the commit contains breaking changes
# 3. 'TaskId' and 'Details' are optional
# 4. Use the imperative mood in the summary line
# 5. Do not end the summary line with a period
# 6. Limit the summary line to 50 characters
# 7. Separate summary from details with a blank line
# 8. Wrap the details at 72 characters
# 9. Use the details to explain what and why vs. how
#
# These rules are a modified subset of https://www.conventionalcommits.org
